title: Definitions
context: §189-42 Definitions. As used in this part: &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of business, economic development, and tourism. &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of business, economic development, and tourism. &ldquo;National Marine Fisheries Service&rdquo; means Financial Assistance Division, National Marine Fisheries Service, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, United States Department of Commerce. &ldquo;SBA&rdquo; means the Federal Small Business Administration. &ldquo;Small fishing vessel&rdquo; means any vessel under five net tons designed to be used in catching fish, processing, or transporting fish loaded on the high seas that derives at least fifty-one per cent of that vessel&rsquo;s gross annual income from commercial (as opposed to recreational) operations, or any vessel outfitted for such activity. [L 1975, c 167, §8; am L 1976, c 70, pt of §2; am L 1987, c 336, §7; am L 1990, c 293, §8] Note &ldquo;Financial Assistance Division&rdquo;, National Marine Fisheries Service, now known as &ldquo;Financial Services Division&rdquo;. Revision Note Numeric designations deleted and definitions rearranged.
